1.content:
For as long as you can remember, you have adored your Uncle Ray. Ray is your father's brother and has been a part of your life from the very beginning, visiting every Sunday for Sunday dinner. For his part, Ray has always lavished attention on you, buying you sweets when you were a young boy and insisting that you sit on his lap where he would hold you close against his big belly, occasionally pinching you affectionately and joking about how scrumptious you looked and how easy it would be to gobble you up whole.

One of the things you have always loved about your Uncle Ray is the man's sheer physical presence. Whereas you have always been small and slim for your age, Ray is tall and big bellied. Unlike your father, himslef a petite and timid man, Uncle Ray exuded raw masculinity. The other thing you have always liked about your big Uncle is the way Ray has always ruled the roost. When Uncle Ray was around, your mum and dad let the big man do as he pleased. This has always been good news for you, as you quickly learned that Uncle Ray would gleefully overrule anything your parent's told you to do.

"Leave the boy alone!" Uncle Ray would growl. "Let him enjoy himself while he can!"

Your admiration for your Uncle Ray grew from the innocent worship of childhood into something stronger and more tangible as you grew into adolescence. Gradually, at first, you found yourself thinking about your big bear of an Uncle more and more. Whenever you felt lonely or sad, the thought of your strong, big bellied Uncle always reassured and comforted you. Then, one day, you felt something new. It was a Sunday and, like so many Sunday's before, Ray sat down on his favourite easy chair and fixed you with his piggy gaze.

"I'm ready for you, boy! Now come here and sit on your Uncle Ray's lap!"

You knew how much your parents hated you sitting on Ray's lap. As you had grown older, they had repeatedly told you that you should grow out of the habit. After all, they reasoned, you no longer liked getting cuddles from your parents, did you? As far as you were concerned though, there was nothing like the reassuring warmth of your Uncle's lap. Uncle Ray was different to anyone else you knew and you loved the sense of security and belonging that you felt whenever you snuggled up to the softness of your Uncle's great flabby belly. That was enough to ensure that you never grew out of wanting to sit with your Uncle. The fact that your parents hated it only made it more fun.

That day, as you sank back into the warmth of Uncle Ray's embrace and enjoyed the feeling of your Uncle's soft belly pressing against your back, you felt, for the first time, the warm sensation of a growing erection. Embarrassed by the obviously growing tent in your trousers, you crossed your legs to keep your parents from seeing. You instinctively knew that what you felt was good and recognised that the only time you ever felt like that was with your Uncle Ray.

As you got older, you tried to get excited by girls but began to realise that only your Uncle Ray could make you feel excited. The feelings that you got from being close to your Uncle Ray felt right, like you were meant to be with him. Although a little worried about what your Uncle might say, you knew that you had to talk to him about it. The day after your 18th birthday, you decided to pay your Uncle Ray a visit.

Nervously, you ring the doorbell of your Uncle's house and wait. Your heart pounds as you are really not sure what to expect, but you feel that you have to talk to him about your feelings.

"Alright, alright! I'm coming!" bellows Ray. A few moments later, the door opens to reveal Ray dressed only in a pair of scruffy jeans and dog eared slippers. You've never seen your Uncle's belly uncovered before and the sight of his hairy pot fills you with excitement. Ray's face is scrunched up in a menacing scowl and he clutches a greasy chicken drumstick in one hand. On seeing you, his face changes. A broad smile creeps across his grease smeared lips.

"Hey, it's my favourite nephew! Come in, come in!" He beckons for you to step inside and closes the door behind you. "So, what brings you here then?" he asks, popping the drumstick in his mouth and gulping heavily, swallowing the whole thing down to his belly, bones and all.

"Wow! Uncle Ray!" you gasp. "How did you do that?"

"Easy. Just opened my throat and boggled it up... Better watch out, eh, or I might do the same to you one day!" Ray laughs.

""But..." you gasp "...you ate the bones as well!"

"Lots of goodness in bones, boy. It's a special talent I have, see. I can eat anything. Hair, bones, the lot! Believe me, once it's in your Uncle Ray's pot, its all mine!" He licks his lips. "Anyway, like I said, what are you doing here? You want a chat... or..." Ray smiles slyly. "Maybe you've come round for dinner?"
